description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension and installation of 2 no. rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probabilities, that the proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension and installation of 2 no. rooflights to front roof slope complies with B.1(d)(ii) (roof volume), B.2(a) (materials) and B.2(c)(ii) (side window) of Class B and C.1(b) (rooflights) of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

The assessment has been based on the original layout of the house that shows a staggered rear elevation. The proposed extension would extend beyond the side elevation of the outrigger and would  have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
